TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {10310=Global Chapter Committee Voting Record - records starting 15-July-2011, 12328=The current chapter handbook can be found here. The Global Chapters Committee is working to revise the handbook and aims to have a new draft for comment by November 1, 2011. If you have any comments, suggestions, or questions please send them to Sarah Baso and she will forward it on to the other committee members., 5371=https://www3.gotomeeting.com/join/131041142}

Committee Operational Support: Name Email Telephone Skype Location Time Zone Sarah Baso sarah.baso 'at' owasp dot org +1.312.869.2779 sarah.baso USA UTC -6/-5 (DST) How to join this committee Join our mailing list funds to OWASP earmarked for Global Chapter Committee. Meetings The global chapters committee meets 2 times per month using Skype. Global Meeting Time Planner - Click Here 2nd Monday of the month @ 19h UTC for EU/US, fits for Andrew, Tin, Josh, Mandeep, Kate, Gustavo, Seba 2nd Tuesday of the month @ 14h UTC for US/Aspac/India, fits for Puneet, Kate, Tin (occasionally), Seba (occasionally), Andrew The meeting is not a goal
